title: Cybercriminals Can Now Clone Any Brandâ€™s Site in Minutes Using Darcula PhaaS v3
description: The threat actors behind the Darcula phishing-as-a-service (PhaaS) platform appear to be readying a new version that allows prospective customers and cyber crooks to clone any brand's legitimate website and create a phishing version, further bringing down the technical expertise required to pull off phishing attacks at scale.
